media.label: Media & Upload
media.description: Configure file upload limits and media processing

export.label: Export & Versioning
export.description: Manage export settings and version control

media.maxFileSizeMB.label: Max Image Upload Size (MB)
media.maxFileSizeMB.description: Set the maximum size for individual image uploads across all projects.

media.maxVideoSizeMB.label: Max Video Upload Size (MB)
media.maxVideoSizeMB.description: Set the maximum size for individual video uploads across all projects.

media.imageProcessing.quality.label: Image Quality
media.imageProcessing.quality.description: Quality setting for all generated image sizes (1-100). Higher values mean better quality but larger file sizes.

media.imageProcessing.sizes.thumb.enable.label: Enable Thumbnails
media.imageProcessing.sizes.thumb.enable.description: Generate thumbnail versions of uploaded images

media.imageProcessing.sizes.small.enable.label: Enable Small Images
media.imageProcessing.sizes.small.enable.description: Generate small versions of uploaded images

media.imageProcessing.sizes.medium.enabl.label: Enable Medium Images
media.imageProcessing.sizes.medium.enabl.description: Generate medium versions of uploaded images

media.imageProcessing.sizes.large.enable.label: Enable Large Images
media.imageProcessing.sizes.large.enable.description: Generate large versions of uploaded images

export.maxVersionsToKeep.label: Max Export Versions to Keep
export.maxVersionsToKeep.description: Maximum number of export versions to keep per project. When this limit is exceeded, the oldest exports are automatically deleted to save storage space.
